basics.name: The Pixel Pioneers
basics.summary: Welcome to the official *The Pixel Pioneers* website. This is a student produced project created by the group known as Team Rocket.

skills.summary: Came up with the game idea

education.summary: Came up with the game idea

work.summary: Came up with the game idea

awards.summary: Prepare for trouble! And make it double! To protect the world from devestation! To unite all peoples within our nation! To denounce the evils of truth and love! To extend our reach to the stars above! Jessie! James! Team Rocket blasts off at the speed of light! Surrender now, or prepare to fight! Meowth! That's right!
